content.rendered:
The Third Canadian Chopin Piano Competition (2010)

Winners

Senior Division
1st Place 2nd Place 3rd Place
Leonard Gilbert Sijing Ye Elizabeth Schumann

Senior Finalists
  • Leonard Gilbert
  • Younggun Kim
  • Eldon Ng
  • Elizabeth Schumann
  • Vicki Ning Wang
  • Sijing Ye

Junior Division
1st Place 2nd Place 3rd Place TIE
Anastasia Rizikov Nathan Kong Amadeusz Kazubowski-
Houston		 Annie Zhou

Junior Finalists
  • Anastasia Rizikov
  • Nathan Kong
  • Amadeusz Kazubowski-Houston
  • Annie Zhou
  • Yike (Tony) Yang
  • Vivian Lou
